name: Paula Deen's Butter Toucher
description:
How many touches does it take to get to the center of a stick of butter?

Join the south's most famous butter aficionado, click away to your heart's content and find out!

For All Ages

Made during the Philly Dev Night TOY JAM

https://itch.io/jam/toy-jam

Design and Art by Grant Andrew Ervin @BrotherEggplant

Code by Taylor Stefanovicz

Music by https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdxlA8UoNB0
